body_html:
@facaiy good point. I think the reason it wasn't included was:

  • There is no use case whatsoever for Input without Network (or Model)
  • Network was never part of the public API so it was fine to remove
  • Input got moved together with it (since they're part of the same setup)
  • Since Network wasn't part of the public API its removal didn't warrant a release note

@facaiy good point. I think the reason it wasn't included was:

There is no use case whatsoever for Input without Network (or Model)

body:
@facaiy good point. I think the reason it wasn't included was:

- There is no use case whatsoever for `Input` without `Network` (or `Model`)
- `Network` was never part of the public API so it was fine to remove
- `Input` got moved together with it (since they're part of the same setup)
- Since `Network` wasn't part of the public API its removal didn't warrant a release note
